TopicTitle: Kerbal grab - drop other than KAS ?

Articles.Content:
Dear players,

i would like to know if there is any other mod than KAS that allows our dear Kerbal to grab and drop parts ?

Example: removing wheels from elements of a base, like on the images 14 and 15 of the MKS album: http://imgur.com/a/dOCcU#13

Thanks for you help
There does not appear to be. The guys doing KAS said they would update it *soon* (probably a week or two).

Thanks for the answer

It would be interesting to have a mod doing just that, nothing more.
There is chopit mod, to just remove part on EVA.
